news.title: Tesla shares drop 7% in premarket trading after Elon Musk says he is launching a political party
news.summary: Elon Musk said he would form a new political party called the "America Party" Musk said the party would focus on electric cars and space travel. The party would be called the America Party.

news.title: Trump threatens extra 10% tariff on countries that align with 'Anti-American' BRICS policies
news.summary: The U.S. will start delivering letters on Monday, detailing tariff rates and any agreements reached with various trading partners. The letters will be delivered to the White House, the State Department, the Treasury Department and other agencies.

news.title: Rep. Mark Green resigns from Congress, leaving Speaker Johnson with an even narrower Republican majority in the House
news.summary: Rep. Mark Green said he was returning to the private sector to start his own business. He did not share details about the business. Green was a member of the House Ways and Means Committee.

news.title: Nvidia challenger Groq expands with first European data center
news.summary: Groq, which is backed by investment arms of Samsung and Cisco, said the data center will be in Helsinki, Finland. Groq is based in New York, with offices in London and San Francisco.

news.title: How Netflix keeps luring big-name directors away from the traditional box office
news.summary: Rian Johnson, Greta Gerwig and Guillermo del Toro are working with Netflix. They have lucrative contracts, creative freedom and a big audience.

news.title: ‘We are blessed’: My husband is inheriting a $1 million home. Should he put it in my name too?
news.summary: “We do not live in a community-property state. We have one son who is now a young adult,” she says.

news.title: Amazon’s Prime Day sale is longer than ever — and even more important than usual for the company. Here’s why.
news.summary: MarketWatch polling suggests interest in Amazon’s super-sized Prime Day is muted. BofA analysts say the longer event suggests Amazon has more capacity to offer discounts, despite tariff fears.

news.title: Stay buckled up — the market ride is going to get wilder still, says this strategist
news.summary: High valuations and revived trade angst may pressure stocks in coming months, say analysts. High valuations, revived trade anxiety may pressure stock prices, they say.

news.title: Don’t buy Wells Fargo’s stock at current prices, analyst says
news.summary: Analyst downgrades Wells Fargo’s stock and upgrades U.S. Bancorp. Regional banks gain favor after big runups by the largest banks.

news.title: Another health insurer has issued a profit warning. But its stock is climbing.
news.summary: Molina Healthcare cuts its profit outlook, but its stock is rising after tumbling last week in response to rival Centene’s warning.
